channel.title: Hybrid pvp drops
channel.description:
i have looked everywhere for a soulution. i googled it i search bared it on here and rune-server but i cant find it.. does any one know how to edit drop rate? Tds are dorpping clawws 100% of the time.
[code]#torm demon 8349:1 892:42 1371:1 1373:1 1113:1 1319:1 995:20000 14484:1[/code]

item.title: Hybrid pvp drops
item.dc:creator: @R3minice R3minice
item.description:
@R3minice wrote:

I think you can edit the drop rates after the : of the npc id, so it would be like 1(man):1(percentage of drop) the higher this value is the rarer the drop is, correct me if I’m wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Hybrid pvp drops
item.dc:creator: @David321 David321
item.description:
@David321 wrote:

[quote=“Needi, post:1, topic:426285”]i have looked everywhere for a soulution.
i googled it
i search bared it on here and rune-server
but i cant find it… does any one know how to edit drop rate? Tds are dorpping clawws 100% of the time.

#torm demon 8349:1 892:42 1371:1 1373:1 1113:1 1319:1 995:20000 14484:1[/quote]

You cant edit drop rate or something. where u see npc number 8349:1 means how much he will drop items , 1 means that he almost dont drop at all. and if u whana set “rare drops” set them in next line i got hybrid pvp syrce too already added nomad and drops too.

Read full topic
